title: Login button not working
description: Users are unable to log in due to an unresponsive login button.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Transactions are failing for multiple users using bKash.

title: Image not loading on dashboard
description: Dashboard banner image fails to load on Chrome browsers.

title: Email notification delayed
description: New ticket notifications are taking over 5 minutes to send.

title: UI alignment issue in footer
description: Footer content overlaps on small screen devices.

title: Server timeout on ticket creation
description: Ticket submission takes too long and fails after 30s.

title: Dark mode toggle not saving preference
description: User dark mode setting resets after reload.

title: Ticket list not updating in real-time
description: Newly created tickets don’t appear without refreshing.

title: Download report button not working
description: Report PDF download fails for most users.

title: Search feature returning wrong results
description: Search queries are not filtering tickets correctly.

title: Customer name not displaying properly
description: Special characters in customer names show as ‘???’.

title: Analytics chart not loading
description: Admin analytics section shows empty charts.
